column6: FROM THE CREATOR OF THE HIT COMIC "COPRA" - Miles Morales the Ultimate Spider-Man! Cloak & Dagger! Bombshell! Black Widow! Kitty Pride! - The next generation of ULTIMATES is here, but are they in over their heads? - They've fought Galactus but can they survive super-powered street gangs and a psycho trying to clean up the streets?
